parameters.name: Where
parameters.description: Position where to move Source relative to Destination as defined by swTableItemInsertPosition_e

parameters.name: Destination
parameters.description: Index of row where to move Source, which is either 1 greater than the Source or 1 less than Source

title: ITableAnnotation.MoveRow
description: Moves a row in this table either up one row or down one row.
signature:
System.Boolean MoveRow( 
   System.Int32
Source
,
   System.Int32
Where
,
   System.Int32
Destination
)

parameters.name: Where
parameters.description: Position where to move Source relative to Destination as defined by swTableItemInsertPosition_e

parameters.name: Destination
parameters.description: Index of row where to move Source, which is either 1 greater than the Source or 1 less than Source

returns: True if a row is moved, false if not
remarks: The index for both rows and columns is 0-based.
